verses.verse: For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and will yet <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3240>set<s%> them in their own <S%H127>land.<s%> The <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> will <S%H3867>join<s%> himself with <S%H5596>them,<s%> and they will unite with the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

The <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> and bring them to their <S%H4725>place.<s%> The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H5157>possess<s%> them in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids.<s%> They will take as <S%H7617>captives<s%> those whose <S%H7617>captives<s%> they <S%H7287>were;<s%> and they shall rule over their <S%H5065>oppressors.<s%>

It will happen in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will give you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from your <S%H6090>sorrow,<s%> from your <S%H6090>trouble,<s%> and from the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> in which you were made to <S%H5647>serve,<s%>

that you will take <S%H5375>up<s%> this <S%H4912>parable<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> "How the <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> has <S%H7673>ceased!<s%> The golden <S%H4062>city<s%> has <S%H7673>ceased!<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of the <S%H4910>rulers,<s%>

who <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in <S%H5678>wrath<s%> with a <S%H1115>continual<s%> <S%H4347>stroke,<s%> who <S%H7287>ruled<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> with a <S%H4783>persecution<s%> that <S%H1097>none<s%> <S%H2820>restrained.<s%>
The whole <S%H776>earth<s%> is at <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and is <S%H8252>quiet.<s%> They break <S%H6476>out<s%> <S%H7440>song.<s%>

<S%H1265>Yes,<s%> the fir trees <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> with <S%H730>you,<s%> with the cedars of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H7901>saying,<s%> "Since you are humbled, no <S%H3772>lumberjack<s%> has come up against <S%H5927>us.<s%>"

<S%H7585>Sheol<s%> from beneath has <S%H7264>moved<s%> for you to <S%H7125>meet<s%> you at your <S%H935>coming.<s%> It stirs <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7496>dead<s%> for <S%H6260>you,<s%> even all the rulers of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> It has raised <S%H6965>up<s%> from their <S%H3678>thrones<s%> all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
They all will <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>ask<s%> <S%H2470>you,<s%> "Have you also become as weak as we <S%H4911>are?<s%> Have you become like us?"

Your <S%H1347>pomp<s%> is brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> with the <S%H1998>sound<s%> of your stringed <S%H5035>instruments.<s%> <S%H7415>Maggots<s%> are <S%H3331>spread<s%> out under <S%H7415>you,<s%> and worms cover <S%H4374>you.<s%>

How you have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> morning <S%H1966>star,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H7837>dawn!<s%> How you are cut <S%H1438>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> who laid the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H2522>low!<s%>

You <S%H559>said<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> "I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven!<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H410>God!<s%> I will <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H4150>assembly,<s%> in the <S%H3411>far<s%> <S%H6828>north!<s%>
I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> above the <S%H1116>heights<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds!<s%> I will make myself <S%H1819>like<s%> the Most <S%H5945>High!<s%>"
Yet you shall be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> to the <S%H3411>depths<s%> of the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Those who <S%H7200>see<s%> you will <S%H7688>stare<s%> at <S%H995>you.<s%> They will ponder <S%H376>you,<s%> saying, "Is this the man who made the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> who <S%H7493>shook<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%>

who <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2040>overthrew<s%> its <S%H5892>cities;<s%> who <S%H6605>didn't<s%> release his <S%H615>prisoners<s%> to their <S%H1004>home?<s%>"
All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But you are cast <S%H7993>away<s%> from your <S%H6913>tomb<s%> like an <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5342>branch,<s%> <S%H3830>clothed<s%> with the <S%H2026>slain,<s%> who are thrust <S%H2944>through<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H953>pit;<s%> like a dead <S%H6297>body<s%> trodden under <S%H947>foot.<s%>

You will not <S%H3161>join<s%> them in <S%H6900>burial,<s%> because you have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> your <S%H776>land.<s%> You have <S%H2026>killed<s%> your <S%H5971>people.<s%> The <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> will not be <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> for <S%H4293>slaughter<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> because of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that they <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6145>cities.<s%>

"I will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H5002>them,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> and <S%H7605>remnant,<s%> and <S%H5209>son<s%> and <S%H5220>son<s%>'s son," <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> it a <S%H4180>possession<s%> for the <S%H7090>porcupine,<s%> and <S%H98>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> I will <S%H2894>sweep<s%> it with the <S%H4292>broom<s%> of <S%H8045>destruction,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1819>"Surely,<s%> as I have thought, so shall it <S%H3289>happen;<s%> and as I have purposed, so shall it <S%H6965>stand:<s%>

that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> in my <S%H776>land,<s%> and tread him under <S%H947>foot<s%> on my <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> Then his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> will <S%H5493>leave<s%> <S%H5448>them,<s%> and his burden <S%H5493>leave<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%>
This is the <S%H3289>plan<s%> that is <S%H3289>determined<s%> for the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%> This is the <S%H3027>hand<s%> that is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> over all the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H3289>planned,<s%> and who can <S%H6565>stop<s%> <S%H3027>it?<s%> His hand is stretched <S%H5186>out,<s%> and who can turn it <S%H7725>back?<s%>"
This <S%H4853>burden<s%> was in the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4194>died.<s%>

<S%H8055>Don't<s%> rejoice, O <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> all of <S%H7626>you,<s%> because the rod that <S%H5221>struck<s%> you is <S%H7665>broken;<s%> for <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5175>serpent<s%>'s <S%H8328>root<s%> an <S%H6848>adder<s%> will <S%H6529>emerge,<s%> and his fruit will be a <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H8314>serpent.<s%>

The <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> will <S%H7462>eat,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> will lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H983>safety;<s%> and I will <S%H4191>kill<s%> your <S%H8328>root<s%> with <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and your <S%H7611>remnant<s%> will be <S%H2026>killed.<s%>

<S%H3213>Howl,<s%> <S%H8179>gate!<s%> <S%H2199>Cry,<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%> You are <S%H4127>melted<s%> <S%H6429>away,<s%> Philistia, all of <S%H6227>you;<s%> for smoke <S%H935>comes<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and there is no <S%H909>straggler<s%> in his <S%H4151>ranks.<s%>

What will they <S%H6030>answer<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation?<s%> That <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and in her the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> will take <S%H2620>refuge.<s%>
